snippet: The reports could not be independently confirmed, but the attacks Friday night in Homs appeared to be the bloodiest episode in the nearly 11-month-old uprising, opposition activists said.
abstract: Opposition activists report that Syrian government forces used a barrage of mortar shells and heavy machine-gun fire in an assault in the central city of Homs, killing at least 200 people and wounding hundreds more.
lead_paragraph: The reports could not be independently confirmed, but the attacks Friday night in Homs appeared to be the bloodiest episode in the nearly 11-month-old uprising, opposition activists said.

headline.seo: In Homs, Syrian Forces Are Said to Have Killed Hundreds
headline.main: Government Is Said to Kill 200 in Attack in Syrian City
headline.print_headline: Government Is Said to Kill 200 in Attack In Syrian City

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
